# Retro Game

Project to create a retro game using a beginner's game-development framework called [Playbuffer](https://github.com/sumo-digital-academy/playbuffer) all written in C++ strictly for Windows. Programming algorithms and techniques such as state machines and object oriented programming were developed in the game loop.
